sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_fb6a32e793f571104768f81d6cba10c2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_akt_guardicore.GuardicoreUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GuardicoreUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var GuardicoreUtils = Class.create();
GuardicoreUtils.prototype = {

    initialize: function() {
		if (!this.canContinue(current.sys_id)) {  // if need to abort function
			return; 
		}
		
        this.label_count = 0;
        this.childLabelCountingObject = {};
        this.uniqLabels = [];
        this.processedCIs = [];

        this.dbug = Boolean(current.getValue('debug') >= '1'); // Debug (1 - Standard debug mode) 
        this.dbug_vm = Boolean(current.getValue('debug') == '2'); // Verbose mode (2 - Verbose debug mode)

        gs.info('GuardicoreUtils > initialize: debug => ' + this.dbug.toString().toUpperCase());
        gs.info('GuardicoreUtils > initialize: debug verbose mode => ' + this.dbug_vm.toString().toUpperCase());

        // SELF-TERMINATION TIME Settings:
        this.actualStart = new GlideDateTime();
        this.terminationTime = new GlideDateTime();
        this.cancelAfterHours = parseFloat(current.getValue('time')); // current config contains termination hours		
        this.terminationTime.addSeconds(3600 * this.cancelAfterHours); // 3600 before testing
    },

    execute: function(configID) {
        if (this.dbug) gs.info('Phase.1: execute() ... start | ' + gs.getUserName());

        try {
            //Check value in field (max_execution_time)
            if (this.cancelAfterHours <= 0) {
                gs.error('gu: invalid value max_execution_time: ' + current.getValue('time'));
                return;
            }

            // STEP.1: READING CONFIG

            var configGR = new GlideRecord('x_akt_guardicore_config');
            if (configGR.get(configID)) {

                var config = configGR; // Config GlideRecord object

                // checking for sys_property "planb"
                var planb = gs.getProperty("x_akt_guardicore.guardicore_config_planb"); //
                if (planb === 'true') {
                    var backupPassword = gs.getProperty("x_akt_guardicore.guardicore_config_password");
                    var backupUsername = gs.getProperty("x_akt_guardicore.guardicore_config_username");
                } else {
                    gs.info('planb is false');
                }
                var isPlanb = planb == 'true'; // planb return string from sys_properties                
                var userName = '';
                var password = '';


                if (isPlanb) {
                    userName = backupUsername;
                    password = backupPassword;
                    if (this.dbug) {
                        gs.info("gu: the credentials were populated from sys_properties");
                    }
                } else {
                    userName = config.getValue('username');
                    password = config.password.getDecryptedValue();
                }

                //var userName = config.getValue('username');
                var passwordEncrypted = config.getValue('password');

                if (this.dbug_vm) {
                    gs.info('Encoded: ' + passwordEncrypted); // we need to know if password is received
                }

                var centraIP = config.getValue('endpoint');

                if (this.dbug_vm) {
                    gs.info('gu: execute(): configID, userName, centraIP => ' + configID + ', ' + userName + ', ' + centraIP);
                }

                // UPDATING "RECORD COUNTER" FIELD
                var aggregate = new GlideAggregate(configGR.getValue('server_table'));

                var encodedQuery = configGR.encoded_query + '';
                if (encodedQuery.toString().trim() != '') aggregate.addEncodedQuery(encodedQuery);
                aggregate.addAggregate('COUNT');
                aggregate.query();

                if (aggregate.next()) {
                    configGR.count = parseInt(aggregate.getAggregate('COUNT'));
                    configGR.workflow_state = 'skipped';
                    configGR.update();
                }

                // STEP.2: ASSEMBLE SERVICENOW REST MESSAGE FOR GETTING ACCESS TOKEN FROM CENTRA REST API

                var sm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('GuardicoreRESTUtils', 'GetToken');
                sm.setStringParameterNoEscape('aggregatorIP', centraIP);

                var body = {
                    "username": userName,
                    "password": password
                };

                // If MID SERVER is being used - include it into REST Message config:

                if (configGR.mid_server) {
                    if (this.dbug) {
                        gs.info('gu: execute() ... using MID Server => ' + configGR.getDisplayValue('mid_server'));
                    }
                    sm.setMIDServer(configGR.getDisplayValue('mid_server'));
                    sm.setEccParameter('skip_sensor', true);
                }

                sm.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(body));

                //STEP.3: SENDING REST MESSAGE & RECEIVING CENTRA TOKEN

                var response = sm.execute();
                var responseBody = response.haveError() ? response.getErrorMessage() : response.getBody();
                var status = response.getStatusCode();
                var requestBody = sm ? sm.getRequestBody() : null;

                if (this.dbug_vm) gs.info('gu: execute(): response => ' + JSON.stringify(response.getBody()));

                if (status != 200) {
                    if (this.dbug) {
                        gs.error("gu: execute() Centra IP: " + centraIP + "\nToken receiving failed, HTTP Status: " + status + ' | ' + body.username);
                    }

                } else {
                    if (this.dbug) {
                        gs.info("gu: execute: Centra IP: " + centraIP + "\nToken receiving successfull HTTP Status: " + status + " | " + gs.getUserName());
                    }
					
					// UPDATE STATE TO "IN PROGRESS"
					configGR.is_creating = true;
					configGR.workflow_state = 'skipped';
					configGR.update();

                    this.createLabels(configGR, JSON.parse(responseBody).access_token);
					
					// UPDATE STATE TO "NOT IN PROGRESS"
					configGR.is_creating = false;
					configGR.workflow_state = 'skipped';
					configGR.update();
                }
            }
        } catch (e) {
            gs.error("gu: execute(error) >> Centra IP: " + centraIP + " : " + e + " | " + gs.getUserName());
        }
		
		// UPDATE STATE TO "NOT IN PROGRESS" for some issue or errors in execute() function. Because button sets is_creating to true
		configGR.is_creating = false;
		configGR.workflow_state = 'skipped';
		configGR.update();
    },


    createLabels: function(configGR, token) {
        if (this.dbug) gs.info('Phase.2: createLabels() ... start | ' + gs.getUserName());

        try {
            // PARAMETERS SETUP

            var MAXIMUM_STRING_LENGTH = 25000000;
            var keyFields = configGR.getValue('label_key_fields').toString().split(',');
            var keyDisplayNames = configGR.getValue('label_key_centra').toString().split(',');
            var serverTable = configGR.getValue('server_table');
            var ciFilter = configGR.getValue('encoded_query');
            var centraIP = configGR.getValue('endpoint');
            var blockSize = parseInt(configGR.getValue('export_block_size'));
            var overrideValues = !!configGR.override_values;
            var ipV6Allowed = !!configGR.export_ipv6;
            var body = [];
            var bodyItem = {};
            var labaelQuantity = 0;
            this.label_count = 0;

            // DEBUG

            if (this.dbug_vm) {
                gs.info('Phase.2: createLabels(): keyFields => ' + keyFields);
                gs.info('Phase.2: createLabels(): keyDisplayName => ' + keyDisplayNames);
                gs.info('Phase.2: createLabels(): serverTable => ' + serverTable);
                gs.info('Phase.2: createLabels(): ciFilter => ' + ciFilter);
                gs.info('Phase.2: createLabels(): centraIP => ' + centraIP);
                gs.info('Phase.2: createLabels(): blockSize => ' + blockSize);
                gs.info('Phase.2: createLabels(): overrideValues => ' + overrideValues);
                gs.info('Phase.2: createLabels(): ipV6Allowed => ' + ipV6Allowed);
                gs.info('Phase.2: this.executionTime() = ' + this.executionTime());
                gs.info('Phase.2: typeof this.executionTime() => ' + typeof this.executionTime());
            }

            // INVALID INPUT HANDLER:

            if (!serverTable || !keyFields || !keyDisplayNames || keyFields.length != keyDisplayNames.length) {
                gs.error("gu: createLabels() >> Centra IP: " + centraIP + "\nInvalid input data. Validate Server table and Label Key fields | " + gs.getUserName());
                return;
            }
			
            // ASSEMBLING LABELS

            for (var i = 0; i < keyFields.length; i++) {
                if (this.executionTime()) {

                    var fieldName = keyFields[i];
                    var fieldDisplayName = keyDisplayNames[i];

                    // MAIN QUERY
                    var gaServer = new GlideAggregate(serverTable);
                    gaServer.addNotNullQuery('ip_address');
                    gaServer.addNotNullQuery(fieldName); // Experiment - why it works?
                    if (ciFilter) {
                        gaServer.addEncodedQuery(ciFilter);
                    }
                    gaServer.groupBy(fieldName); // group records by the same value of a field - create groupped labels
                    gaServer.addAggregate('COUNT');
                    gaServer.query();

                    // this comment is necessary
                    // 					gaServer.next(); // only for testing!
                    //                     if (this.dbug_vm) {
                    //                         gs.info('gu: createLabels() => (Label groups for FieldName: *' + fieldName + '*) ' + gaServer.getAggregate('COUNT') + ' | ' + gs.getUserName());
                    //                     }

                    // WORK WITH VALUES:

                    while (gaServer.next() && (this.executionTime())) { // Group looping
                        var criteriaArray = [];

                        var server = new GlideRecord(serverTable);
                        server.addNotNullQuery('ip_address');
                        server.addQuery(fieldName, gaServer.getValue(fieldName)); // why it works?
                        if (ciFilter) {
                            server.addEncodedQuery(ciFilter);
                        }
                        server.query();

                        while (server.next() && (this.executionTime())) {
							
							// ABORTING
							if (!this.canContinue(configGR.sys_id)) {  // if need to abort function
								gs.info('gu: createLabels() => Processing was terminated. The cause is pressing the "Abort Processing" button.' +
									   ' LABELS SENT: ' + this.label_count);
								return;
							}
							
							// PROCESSING
                            var ipArray = this.getIPs(server.ip_address, server.name, ipV6Allowed);
                            for (var j = 0; j < ipArray.length; j++) {
                                criteriaArray.push({
                                    "op": "SUBNET",
                                    "field": "numeric_ip_addresses",
                                    "argument": ipArray[j]
                                });

                                this.label_count += 1;
                            }

                            // CHECKING for already processed CIs
                            if (this.processedCIs.indexOf(server.sys_id.toString()) == -1) {
                                this.processedCIs.push(server.sys_id.toString());

                                if (this.executionTime()) {
                                    this._processRelationships(server, centraIP, token, overrideValues, blockSize, configGR, ipV6Allowed); //optimize processing by avoiding duplicates
                                }
                            } else {
                                if (this.dbug_vm) gs.info("gu: createLabels() >> " + server.name + " already was processed");
                            }
							
							// UPDATING labels_counter
                            configGR.setValue('labels_counter', this.label_count);
                            configGR.workflow_state = 'skipped';
                            configGR.update();
                        }

                        labaelQuantity += criteriaArray.length; // stores only labels from parent config


                        if (this.dbug_vm) {
                            gs.info('gu: createLabels() LENGTH ' + criteriaArray.length);
                        }

                        if (criteriaArray.length > 0) {
                            bodyItem = {
                                "key": fieldDisplayName,
                                "value": gaServer.getDisplayValue(fieldName), //val, // Support of Dot-Walking
                                "criteria": criteriaArray
                            };


                            // ADDING UNIQUE LABELS IN ARRAY

                            var labelKeyInCentra = bodyItem.key + ":" + bodyItem.value;
                            var isUniq = this.uniqLabels.indexOf(labelKeyInCentra) == -1; // -1 if unique

                            if (isUniq) {
                                this.uniqLabels.push(labelKeyInCentra);
                            } else {
                                continue; // don't add to the body if the label is duplicate
                            }

                            // POPULATING AND SENDING BODY

                            if (body.length < blockSize && JSON.stringify(body).length < MAXIMUM_STRING_LENGTH) {
                                // if body is not yet full - add bodyItem to it
                                body.push(bodyItem);
                            } else {
                                // if body is full - need to send content, empty body and put bodyItem into empty body
                                if (this.executionTime()) this._sendLabelsRequest(centraIP, token, body, overrideValues, configGR);
                                body = [];
                                body.push(bodyItem);
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }

                // UPDAITING CHILD CONFIG labels_counter

                for (var childConfigID in this.childLabelCountingObject) {
                    if (this.dbug_vm) {
                        gs.info("gu: createLabels() => childLabelCountingObject= " + childConfigID + " : " + this.childLabelCountingObject[childConfigID]);
                    }

                    var chTable = new GlideRecord("x_akt_guardicore_config");
                    chTable.addQuery("sys_id", childConfigID);
                    chTable.setLimit(1);
                    chTable.query();

                    if (chTable.next()) {
                        chTable.setValue("labels_counter", this.childLabelCountingObject[childConfigID]);
                        chTable.workflow_state = 'skipped';
                        chTable.update();
                    }
                }
            }

            if (this.dbug_vm) {
                gs.info('gu: createLables() => body is ' + JSON.stringify(body));
            }

            // Sending latest body block
            if (body.length > 0) {
                if (this.executionTime()) this._sendLabelsRequest(centraIP, token, body, overrideValues, configGR);
            }


            if (this.dbug) {
                gs.info('gu: createLables() => LABEL QUANTITY ' + labaelQuantity);
                gs.info('gu: createLables() => LABEL QUANTITY CHILD ' + (this.label_count - labaelQuantity));
                gs.info('gu: createLabels() => Label create/update operation has been finished.');

                if (this.terminationTime.after(new GlideDateTime())) {
                    gs.info('INFO *** STARTED at ' + this.actualStart + ' FINISHED at ' + new GlideDateTime() + ' : DONE');
                } else {
                    gs.info('INFO *** STARTED at ' + this.actualStart + ' FINISHED at ' + new GlideDateTime() + ' : PROBLEM - very long time');
                }
            }

        } catch (ex) {
            gs.error('Phase.2:Error! > ' + ex);
            gs.error("Phase.2: createLabels() >> Centra IP: " + centraIP + "\nException creation/updation labels: " + ex.message + " | " + gs.getUserName());
        }
    },

    _processRelationships: function(server, centraIP, token, overrideValues, blockSize, configGR, ipV6Allowed) {

        // Do not run relationship analysis if there is no related config
        var cfg = new GlideRecord('x_akt_guardicore_config');
        cfg.addQuery('parent', configGR.sys_id.toString());
        cfg.addQuery('active', true);
        cfg.query();

        if (cfg.hasNext()) {
            if (this.dbug_vm) gs.info('Relationships(-1-): _processRelationships() ... start | ' + gs.getUserName()); // DEBUG

            try {

                var MAXIMUM_STRING_LENGTH = 25000000;
                var body = [];
                var serverID = server.getUniqueValue();

                var rel = new GlideRecord('cmdb_rel_ci');
                rel.addEncodedQuery('child=' + serverID + '^ORparent=' + serverID);
                rel.addNotNullQuery('parent');
                rel.addNotNullQuery('child');
                rel.query();

                var relCount = new GlideAggregate('cmdb_rel_ci');
                relCount.addEncodedQuery('child=' + serverID + '^ORparent=' + serverID);
                relCount.addNotNullQuery('parent');
                relCount.addNotNullQuery('child');
                relCount.addAggregate('COUNT');
                relCount.query();
                relCount.next();

                var numberOfRelationships = relCount.getAggregate('COUNT');

                if (this.dbug_vm) {
                    gs.info('Relationships(-2-): _processRelationships() => found total relationships(' + server.name + '): ' + numberOfRelationships + ' | ' + gs.getUserName());
                }

                if (numberOfRelationships == 0) {
                    gs.info('Relationships stop process' + server.name + '): ' + numberOfRelationships + ' | ' + gs.getUserName());
                    return;
                } else {
                    gs.info('Continue relationships' + server.name + '): ' + numberOfRelationships + ' | ' + gs.getUserName());
                }

                while (rel.next() && (this.executionTime())) {

                    var relRecord = rel.getValue('child') == serverID ? rel.parent.getRefRecord() : rel.child.getRefRecord(); // relRecord is a related CI (Business Service, Business Application etc)
                    var criteriaArray = [];

                    //IPs that belong to the all CI from main configuration
                    var stringIP = '';
                    var relBack = new GlideRecord('cmdb_rel_ci');
                    relBack.addEncodedQuery('child=' + relRecord.sys_id.toString() + '^ORparent=' + relRecord.sys_id.toString()); // get all relationships of Related CI
                    relBack.addNotNullQuery('parent');
                    relBack.addNotNullQuery('child');
                    relBack.query();

                    // run through all realted CIs of our Related CI (Businsess Service, App etc)
                    while (relBack.next()) {
                        var relBackRecord = relBack.getValue('child') == relRecord.getUniqueValue() ? relBack.parent.getRefRecord() : relBack.child.getRefRecord(); // CI related to Related CI

                        //relBackRecord must filtered by configGR.getValue('encoded_query')
                        var queryMatchBack = GlideFilter.checkRecord(relBackRecord, configGR.encoded_query.toString());

                        if (this.dbug_vm) gs.info('queryMatchBack => ' + queryMatchBack + ', relBackRecord:' + relBackRecord.name + '[' + relBackRecord.sys_class_name + ' << ' + relRecord.name);


                        var childTablesArray = (new GlideTableHierarchy(configGR.getValue('server_table')).getTableExtensions());
                        childTablesArray.push(relBackRecord.getTableName()); // include main config CI into analysis also
                        var isChild = false;

                        for (var i = 0; i < childTablesArray.length; i++) {
                            if (childTablesArray[i] == relBackRecord.getTableName()) {
                                isChild = true;
                            }
                        }

                        //if (relBackRecord.getTableName() == configGR.getValue('server_table') && queryMatchBack == true) {
                        if (isChild && queryMatchBack == true) {
                            if (stringIP) {
                                stringIP += ',' + relBackRecord.ip_address;
                            } else {
                                stringIP = relBackRecord.ip_address;
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    var ipArray = this.getIPs(stringIP, relRecord.name, ipV6Allowed); // IPs that belong to the all CI from main configuration

                    for (var j = 0; j < ipArray.length; j++) {
                        criteriaArray.push({
                            "op": "SUBNET",
                            "field": "numeric_ip_addresses",
                            "argument": ipArray[j]
                        });
                    }

                    var chTable = new GlideRecord('x_akt_guardicore_config');
                    chTable.addQuery('active', true);
                    chTable.addQuery('server_table', relRecord.getTableName());
                    chTable.addQuery('parent', configGR.getUniqueValue());
                    chTable.query();

                    var chTableCount = new GlideAggregate('x_akt_guardicore_config');
                    chTableCount.addQuery('active', true);
                    chTableCount.addQuery('server_table', relRecord.getTableName());
                    chTableCount.addQuery('parent', configGR.getUniqueValue());
                    chTableCount.addAggregate('COUNT');
                    chTableCount.query();
                    chTableCount.next();

                    if (this.dbug_vm) gs.info('Relationships(-3-): _processRelationships() => found configs(chTable): ' + chTableCount.getAggregate('COUNT') + ' | ' + gs.getUserName());


                    while (chTable.next() && (this.executionTime())) {
                        var queryMatch = GlideFilter.checkRecord(relRecord, chTable.encoded_query.toString());
                        gs.info('queryMatch => ' + queryMatch + ' >> ' + typeof chTable.getValue('encoded_query'));

                        if (!chTable.getValue('encoded_query') || queryMatch == true) {

                            var keyFieldsChild = ('' + chTable.getValue('label_key_fields')).toString().split(',');
                            var keyDisplayNamesChild = ('' + chTable.getValue('label_key_centra')).toString().split(',');

                            var bodyItem = {};

                            for (var i = 0; i < keyFieldsChild.length; i++) {

                                var fieldNameChild = keyFieldsChild[i];
                                var fieldDisplayNameChild = keyDisplayNamesChild[i];

                                if (relRecord.getDisplayValue(fieldNameChild)) { // why it works ?
                                    bodyItem = {
                                        "key": fieldDisplayNameChild,
                                        "value": relRecord.getDisplayValue(fieldNameChild), //val2, // Dot-Walking Support - why it works?
                                        "criteria": criteriaArray
                                    };

                                    // CHECK FOR UNIQUE LABEL "KEY:VALUE"

                                    var labelKeyInCentra = bodyItem.key + ":" + bodyItem.value;
                                    var isUniq = this.uniqLabels.indexOf(labelKeyInCentra) == -1; // -1 if unique

                                    if (isUniq) {
                                        this.uniqLabels.push(labelKeyInCentra);

                                        //COUNTING child config labels_count 
                                        var childConfigLabelsCount = 1; //body.length;
                                        var childConfigID = chTable.getUniqueValue();
                                        var isNewChildConfig = !this.childLabelCountingObject.hasOwnProperty(childConfigID);
                                        if (isNewChildConfig) {
                                            this.childLabelCountingObject[childConfigID] = 0;
                                        }
                                        this.childLabelCountingObject[childConfigID] += childConfigLabelsCount; // add +1 for certain child config by key "childConfigID"

                                    } else {
                                        if (this.dbug_vm) {
                                            gs.info("gu: createLabels() >> dublicated label found");
                                        }
                                        continue; // don't add to the body if the label is duplicate
                                    }


                                    if (criteriaArray.length > 0) {

                                        if (body.length < blockSize && JSON.stringify(body).length < MAXIMUM_STRING_LENGTH) {
                                            body.push(bodyItem);

                                        } else {
                                            if (this.dbug_vm) {
                                                gs.info('gu:Child Body is: ' + JSON.stringify(body));
                                            }

                                            if (this.executionTime()) this._sendLabelsRequest(centraIP, token, body, overrideValues, configGR);
                                            body = [];
                                            body.push(bodyItem);
                                        }
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                        }


                    }
                }

                // body is like: [{"keyfield1": "value1",...}, {"keyfield2": "value2",..., ...}]
                if (body.length > 0) { // 
                    this.label_count += body.length;

                    if (this.dbug_vm) {
                        gs.info('Relationships(-4-): Child Body is: ' + JSON.stringify(body));
                    }

                    if (this.executionTime()) this._sendLabelsRequest(centraIP, token, body, overrideValues, configGR);
                }

            } catch (ex) {
                var message = ex.message;
                gs.error("Relationships(5): processRelationships() >> Centra IP: " + centraIP + "\nException creation/updation relationships labels: " + message, "GuardicoreUtils by " + gs.getUserName());
            }
        }
    },

    _sendLabelsRequest: function(centraIP, token, body, overrideValues, configGR) {
        if (this.dbug) {
            gs.info('Phase.3: _sendLabelsRequest() ... started | ' + gs.getUserName());
            gs.info(JSON.stringify(body));

        }
        if (this.dbug_vm) {
            gs.debug(JSON.stringify(body));
        }

        var sm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('GuardicoreRESTUtils', 'CreateLabels');
        sm.setStringParameter('aggregatorIP', centraIP);
        sm.setRequestHeader('Authorization', 'bearer' + ' ' + token);
        sm.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(body));

        if (configGR.mid_server) {
            if (this.dbug) gs.info('gu: _sendLabelsRequest() ... using MID Server => ' + configGR.getDisplayValue('mid_server'));
            sm.setMIDServer(configGR.getDisplayValue('mid_server'));
            sm.setEccParameter('skip_sensor', true);
        }

        if (this.dbug_vm) {
            gs.debug("gu: _sendLabelsRequest() >> Centra IP: " + centraIP + "\nRequest to create " + body.length + ' label(s) was sent | ' + gs.getUserName());
        }

        if (overrideValues == true) {
            sm.setQueryParameter('override', 'true');
        } else {
            sm.setQueryParameter('append', 'true');
        }

        var response = sm.executeAsync(); // var response = sm.executeAsync(); // and comment all code below when async // sm.execute()
        // comments below are necessary
        //         var responseBody = response.haveError() ? response.getErrorMessage() : response.getBody();
        //         var status = response.getStatusCode();

        //         if (this.dbug) {
        //             if (status != 200)
        //                 gs.error("gu: _sendLabelsRequest() >> Centra IP: " + centraIP + "\nLabel creation/updation failed, HTTP Status: " + status + ' Response:' + responseBody + " | " + gs.getUserName());
        //             else {
        //                 gs.info("gu: _sendLabelsRequest() >> Centra IP: " + centraIP + "\nLabel creation/updation successfull, HTTP Status: " + status + ' Response:' + responseBody + " | " + gs.getUserName());

        //             }
        //         }
    },

    validIP: function(ip, name, ipV6allowed) {

        // PATTERNS
        var ipv4_reg = /^(([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9]{2}|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])\.){3}([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9]{2}|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])$/;
        var ipv4v6_reg = /((^\s*((([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9]{2}|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])\.){3}([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9]{2}|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5]))\s*$)|(^\s*((([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:){7}([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}|:))|(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:){6}(:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}|((25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)){3})|:))|(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:){5}(((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){1,2})|:((25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)){3})|:))|(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:){4}(((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){1,3})|((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4})?:((25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)){3}))|:))|(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:){3}(((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){1,4})|((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){0,2}:((25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)){3}))|:))|(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:){2}(((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){1,5})|((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){0,3}:((25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)){3}))|:))|(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:){1}(((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){1,6})|((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){0,4}:((25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)){3}))|:))|(:(((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){1,7})|((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){0,5}:((25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)){3}))|:)))(%.+)?\s*$))/g;

        // DO NOT EXPORT IPs that start with: 169.254 
        var restrictedStart = '169.254';

        if (ip.startsWith(restrictedStart)) {
            gs.debug("gu: validIP() >> Found Restricted Starting IP for CI " + name + " , ignoring it: " + ip + " | " + gs.getUserName());
            return false;
        }

        var ip_reg = ipV6allowed == true ? ipv4v6_reg : ipv4_reg;

        if (!ip_reg.test(ip.trim())) {
            if (this.dbug) {
                gs.debug("gu: validIP() >> Found invalid IP for CI " + name + " , ignoring it: " + ip + " | " + gs.getUserName());
            }
            return false;
        }

        return true;
    },

    /* Returns an array of IPs 
     */
    getIPs: function(ips_str, name, ipV6allowed) {
        //if (this.dbug) gs.info('gu: getIPs() ... start | ' + gs.getUserName()); // to much logs

        var ips_list = ips_str.split(','); // Array	
        var resultedIPs = [];

        for (var i = 0; i < ips_list.length; i++) {
            ips_list[i] = ips_list[i].trim();
            if (this.validIP(ips_list[i], name, ipV6allowed)) {
                resultedIPs.push(ips_list[i]);
            } else {
				if (this.dbug) gs.info('gu: getIPs() ... INVALID IP FOUND: | ' + ips_list[i]);
			}
        }
		
		// no need now
//         if (this.dbug_vm) {
//             gs.info('gu: getIPs:resultedIps.length = ' + resultedIPs.length);
//         }

        return resultedIPs; // Array of IPs
    },

    executionTime: function() {
        return this.terminationTime.after(new GlideDateTime());
    },


    scheduleExport: function() {

    },

    testConnection: function(configID) {
        gs.info('TestConnection ...... start | ' + gs.getUserName());

        try {

            var configGR = new GlideRecord('x_akt_guardicore_config');
            if (configGR.get(configID)) {

                var config = configGR;

                // checking for sys_property "planb"				
                gs.info('TestConnection ...... checking if sys_properties');
                var planb = gs.getProperty("x_akt_guardicore.guardicore_config_planb"); //
                //start
                var isPlanb = planb == 'true'; // planb return string from sys_properties               
                var userName = '';
                var password = '';

                if (isPlanb) {
                    gs.info('TestConnection ...... alternative credentials enabled!');
                    var backupPassword = gs.getProperty("x_akt_guardicore.guardicore_config_password");
                    var backupUsername = gs.getProperty("x_akt_guardicore.guardicore_config_username");
                    userName = backupUsername;
                    password = backupPassword;

                } else {
                    gs.info('TestConnection ..... retrieving credentials from config: ' + configGR.sys_id.toString());
                    userName = config.getValue('username');
                    password = config.password.getDecryptedValue();
                    //config.password.getDecryptedValue(); // Deprecated - stoped working on 2024.02.08   
                }

                var centraIP = configGR.endpoint.toString();

                gs.info('GuardicoreUtils > testConnection ... preparing REST Message');
                var sm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('GuardicoreRESTUtils', 'GetToken');
                sm.setStringParameterNoEscape('aggregatorIP', centraIP);

                if (configGR.mid_server) {
                    gs.info('GuardicoreUtils.testConnection ... using MID Server => ' + configGR.getDisplayValue('mid_server'));
                    sm.setMIDServer(configGR.getDisplayValue('mid_server'));
                    sm.setEccParameter('skip_sensor', true);
                }

                var body = {
                    "username": userName,
                    "password": password
                };

                sm.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(body));
                var response = sm.execute();
                var responseBody = response.haveError() ? response.getErrorMessage() : response.getBody();
                var status = response.getStatusCode();
                var requestBody = sm ? sm.getRequestBody() : null;

                if (status != 200) {
                    gs.addErrorMessage("Testing Connection failed! HTTP Status: " + status + '\nResponse: ' + responseBody);
                } else {
                    gs.addInfoMessage("Connection is OK. Authentication is successfull.");
                }

            }

        } catch (ex) {
            gs.error("GuardicoreUtils.testConnection ... Centra IP: " + centraIP + "\nException while testing the connection: " + ex + " | " + gs.getUserName());
        }
    },
	
	canContinue: function(configID) {
		var configGR = new GlideRecord('x_akt_guardicore_config');
		if (configGR.get(configID)) {
			if (!configGR.is_aborting) {
				return true;
			} else {
				// UPDATE STATE TO "READY"
				configGR.is_creating = false;
				configGR.is_aborting = false; // it works only if you call canContinue() one time: in parent or in child counting function
				configGR.workflow_state = 'skipped';
				configGR.update();
				return false;
			}
		} else {
			gs.error('gu: createLabels() => canContinue(): Configuration record not found for configID:' + configID);
			return;
		}
	},

    type: 'GuardicoreUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Andrii_ICL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-16 18:40:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>fb6a32e793f571104768f81d6cba10c2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GuardicoreUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Guardicore" source="x_akt_guardicore">659d22eb93b571104768f81d6cba105d</sys_package><sys_policy>protected</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Guardicore">659d22eb93b571104768f81d6cba105d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_fb6a32e793f571104768f81d6cba10c2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-02 01:48:51</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_ui_form_sections form_id="a72042ab471d8610df9c02b2846d43a9" sys_domain="global" table="x_akt_guardicore_lavi" version="3"><sys_ui_form action="DELETE"><name>x_akt_guardicore_lavi</name><roles/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_form</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-07 14:04:55</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a72042ab471d8610df9c02b2846d43a9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_akt_guardicore_lavi</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Guardicore" source="x_akt_guardicore">659d22eb93b571104768f81d6cba105d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Guardicore">659d22eb93b571104768f81d6cba105d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_form_sections_a72042ab471d8610df9c02b2846d43a9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-07 14:04:55</sys_updated_on><sys_user/><view display_value="Default view" name="NULL">Default view</view><view_name/></sys_ui_form></sys_ui_form_sections></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_a586a7a047740250e85946bd416d43c3
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>x_akt_guardicore.count_label</event_name><name>GuardicoreCountLabelsEventProcessor</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[gs.info('Guardicore: EventProcessor ... started | ' + gs.getUserID());

if (current) {
    gs.info('Guardicore: CountLabelsEventProcessor ... Config #' + current.number);
    gs.info('Guardicore: CountLabelsEventProcessor ... Config ID:' + current.sys_id);
	
	var configID = current.sys_id;
    (new x_akt_guardicore.GuardicoreLabelCounter()).countLabels(configID);

} else {
    gs.warn('Guardicore: CountLabelsEventProcessor cannot find configuration!');
}]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>anton.kharuzhy@gmail.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-03-04 17:19:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a586a7a047740250e85946bd416d43c3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GuardicoreCountLabelsEventProcessor</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Guardicore" source="x_akt_guardicore">659d22eb93b571104768f81d6cba105d</sys_package><sys_policy>protected</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Guardicore">659d22eb93b571104768f81d6cba105d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_a586a7a047740250e85946bd416d43c3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>anton.kharuzhy@gmail.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-04 17:42:03</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

    criteriaArray.push({
        "op": "SUBNET",
        "field": "numeric_ip_addresses",

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="syntax_editor_macro"><syntax_editor_macro action="DELETE"><comments>GlideDateTime is a class in the ServiceNow scripting environment used to handle date and time values.</comments><name>gdt</name><sys_class_name>syntax_editor_macro</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Vlad_ICL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-07 06:34:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>a5b9d7c0935c82504768f81d6cba10e2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>gdt</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Guardicore" source="x_akt_guardicore">659d22eb93b571104768f81d6cba105d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Guardicore">659d22eb93b571104768f81d6cba105d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>syntax_editor_macro_a5b9d7c0935c82504768f81d6cba10e2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Vlad_ICL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-07 06:34:53</sys_updated_on><text>var gdt = new GlideDateTime();   // Initializes with the current date and time
var gdt = new GlideDateTime('yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss');   // Initializes with a specific date and time string

var formattedDateTime = gdt.getDisplayValue();    // Returns a string representation in the user's timezone

gdt.addDays(5);   // Adds 5 days to the current date and time

var otherDateTime = new GlideDateTime();
if (gdt.compareTo(otherDateTime) < 0) 
{
    //  gdt is before otherDateTime
}</text></syntax_editor_macro></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_2a40b991470cc650e85946bd416d4358
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_akt_guardicore.GuardicoreLabelCounter</api_name><caller_access>1</caller_access><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GuardicoreLabelCounter</name><script><![CDATA[var GuardicoreLabelCounter = Class.create();
GuardicoreLabelCounter.prototype = {

    initialize: function() {
        gs.info('Guardicore: Label Counter .......... initialized');

        if (!this.canContinue(current.sys_id)) { // if need to abort function
            return;
        }

        this.totalLabels = 0;
        this.uniqLabels = []; // for child confings
        this.processedCIs = []; // for parent confing

        this.dbug = Boolean(current.getValue('debug') >= '1'); // Debug (1 - Standard debug mode)
        this.dbug_vm = Boolean(current.getValue('debug') == '2'); // Verbose mode (2 - Verbose debug mode)

        gs.info('gu: initialize(): debug => ' + this.dbug.toString().toUpperCase());
        gs.info('gu: initialize(): debug verbose mode => ' + this.dbug_vm.toString().toUpperCase());

        // SELF-TERMINATION TIME Settings:
        this.actualStart = new GlideDateTime();
        this.terminationTime = new GlideDateTime();
        this.cancelAfterHours = parseFloat(current.getValue('time')); // current config contains termination hours
        this.terminationTime.addSeconds(3600 * this.cancelAfterHours);


        gs.info('gu: initialize(): Cancel After Hours => ' + this.cancelAfterHours);
        gs.info('gu: initialize(): Termination Time => ' + this.terminationTime.getDisplayValue());
    },

    countLabels: function(configID) {
        if (this.dbug) {
            gs.info('Counting amount of Labels ... start |' + gs.getUserName() + '-' + configID);
        }

        try {
            if (this.cancelAfterHours <= 0) {
                gs.error('gu: invalid value max_execution_time: ' + current.getValue('time'));
                return;
            }

            //configGR get config
            var configGR = new GlideRecord('x_akt_guardicore_config');
            if (configGR.get(configID)) {
                var config = configGR;

                //debug
                if (this.dbug_vm) {
                    gs.info('gu: countLabels(): configID, userName => ' + configID + ' - ' + gs.getUserName());
                }

            } else {
                gs.error('gu: countLabels(): Configuration record not found for configID:' + configID);
                return;
            }

            // UPDATE STATE TO "IN PROGRESS"
            configGR.is_calculating = true;
            configGR.workflow_state = 'skipped';
            configGR.update();


            // UPDATING "RECORD COUNTER" FIELD
            var aggregate = new GlideAggregate(configGR.getValue('server_table'));

            var encodedQuery = configGR.encoded_query + '';
            if (encodedQuery.toString().trim() != '') aggregate.addEncodedQuery(encodedQuery);
            aggregate.addAggregate('COUNT');
            aggregate.query();

            if (aggregate.next()) {
                configGR.count = parseInt(aggregate.getAggregate('COUNT'));
                configGR.workflow_state = 'skipped';
                configGR.update();
            }

            var MAXIMUM_STRING_LENGTH = 25000000;
            var keyFields = configGR.getValue('label_key_fields').toString().split(',');
            var keyDisplayNames = configGR.getValue('label_key_centra').toString().split(',');
            var serverTable = configGR.getValue('server_table');
            var server = new GlideRecord(serverTable);
            var ciFilter = configGR.getValue('encoded_query') || '';
            var blockSize = parseInt(configGR.getValue('export_block_size'));
            var overrideValues = !!configGR.override_values;
            var ipV6Allowed = !!configGR.export_ipv6;
            var totallabels = 0;
            var body = [];
            var static = configGR.getValue('static_field');
            var mode = configGR.getValue('mode');

            //Add debug script

            if (this.dbug_vm) {
                gs.info('Debug: configID=' + configID);
                gs.info('Debug: keyFields=' + keyFields);
                gs.info('Debug: serverTable=' + serverTable);
            }


            //validation check
            if (!serverTable || !keyFields || !keyDisplayNames || keyFields.length != keyDisplayNames.length) {
                gs.error("gu: countLabels(): " + "\nInvalid input data. Validate Server table and Label Key fields | " + gs.getUserName());
                return;
            }

            //COUNTING
            this.totalLabels = 0;

            for (var i = 0; i < keyFields.length; i++) {
                if (this.executionTime()) {
                    var fieldName = keyFields[i];
                    var fieldDisplayName = keyDisplayNames[i];

                    // MAIN QUERY. GROUP BY FIELD (without IP address NotNullQuery)
                    var gaServer = new GlideAggregate(serverTable);
                    gaServer.addNotNullQuery(fieldName);
                    if (ciFilter) {
                        gaServer.addEncodedQuery(ciFilter);
                    }
                    gaServer.groupBy(fieldName); // group records by the same value of a field - create groupped labels
                    gaServer.addAggregate('COUNT');
                    gaServer.query();

                    if (this.dbug_vm) {
                        gs.info('gu: countLabels() => (Label groups for FieldName: *' + fieldName + '*) ' + gaServer.getAggregate('COUNT') + ' | ' + gs.getUserName());
                    }

                    // WORK WITH VALUES:

                    while (gaServer.next() && (this.executionTime())) { // Group looping
                        this.totalLabels += 1;

                        var criteriaArray = [];
                        server = new GlideRecord(serverTable);
                        server.addNotNullQuery('ip_address');

                        if (mode == 'static') {
                            if (static === 'ip_hostname') {
                                server.addEncodedQuery("host_nameISNOTEMPTY^ORfqdnISNOTEMPTY");
                            } else {
                                server.addNotNullQuery('mac_address'); // IP + MAC
                            }
                        }

                        server.addQuery(fieldName, gaServer.getValue(fieldName));
                        if (ciFilter) {
                            server.addEncodedQuery(ciFilter);
                        }
                        server.query();

                        while (server.next() && (this.executionTime())) {

                            // ABORTING IF NOT IN PROGRESS
                            if (!this.canContinue(configGR.sys_id)) { // if need to abort function
                                gs.info('gu: countLabels() => Processing was terminated. The cause is pressing the "Abort Processing" button.' +
                                    'LABELS CALCULATED: ' + this.totalLabels);
                                return;
                            }

                            var ipArray = this.getIPs(server.ip_address, server.name, ipV6Allowed);
                            for (var j = 0; j < ipArray.length; j++) {
                                criteriaArray.push({
                                    "op": "SUBNET",
                                    "field": "numeric_ip_addresses",
                                    "argument": ipArray[j]
                                });
                            }

                            // CHECK for already processed CIs

                            if (this.processedCIs.indexOf(server.sys_id.toString()) == -1) {
                                this.processedCIs.push(server.sys_id.toString());
                                this.countChildLabels(server, overrideValues, blockSize, configGR, ipV6Allowed);
                            } else {
                                if (this.dbug_vm) gs.info("gu: countLabels() >> " + server.name + " already was processed");
                            }
                        }

                        configGR.setValue('labels_calculated', this.totalLabels);
                        configGR.workflow_state = 'skipped';
                        configGR.update();

                        if (criteriaArray.length > 0) {

                            // ADDING UNIQUE LABELS IN ARRAY

                            var labelKeyInCentra = fieldDisplayName + ":" + gaServer.getDisplayValue(fieldName); // "key:value"
                            var isUniq = this.uniqLabels.indexOf(labelKeyInCentra) == -1; // -1 if unique

                            if (isUniq) {
                                this.uniqLabels.push(labelKeyInCentra);
                            } else {
                                continue; // don't add to the body if the label is duplicate
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }


            if (this.dbug) {
                if (this.terminationTime.after(new GlideDateTime())) {
                    gs.info('INFO *** STARTED at ' + this.actualStart + ' FINISHED at ' + new GlideDateTime() + ' : DONE');
                } else {
                    gs.info('INFO *** STARTED at ' + this.actualStart + ' FINISHED at ' + new GlideDateTime() + ' : PROBLEM - very long time');
                }
            }
        } catch (ex) {
            gs.error("gu: countLabels(error): " + " : " + ex + " | " + gs.getUserName());
        }

        // UPDATE STATE TO "NOT IN PROGRESS"
        configGR.is_calculating = false;
        configGR.workflow_state = 'skipped';
        configGR.update();
    },

    countChildLabels: function(server, overrideValues, blockSize, configGR, ipV6Allowed) {
        var cfg = new GlideRecord('x_akt_guardicore_config');
        cfg.addQuery('parent', configGR.sys_id.toString());
        cfg.addQuery('active', true);
        cfg.query();

        if (cfg.hasNext()) {
            try {

                var MAXIMUM_STRING_LENGTH = 25000000;
                var body = [];
                var serverID = server.getUniqueValue();

                var rel = new GlideRecord('cmdb_rel_ci');
                rel.addEncodedQuery('child=' + serverID + '^ORparent=' + serverID);
                rel.addNotNullQuery('parent');
                rel.addNotNullQuery('child');
                rel.query();

                var relCount = new GlideAggregate('cmdb_rel_ci');
                relCount.addEncodedQuery('child=' + serverID + '^ORparent=' + serverID);
                relCount.addNotNullQuery('parent');
                relCount.addNotNullQuery('child');
                relCount.addAggregate('COUNT');
                relCount.query();
                relCount.next();

                var numberOfRelationships = relCount.getAggregate('COUNT');

                if (numberOfRelationships == 0) {
                    gs.info('Relationships stop process' + server.name + '): ' + numberOfRelationships + ' | ' + gs.getUserName());
                    return;
                } else {
                    gs.info('Continue relationships' + server.name + '): ' + numberOfRelationships + ' | ' + gs.getUserName());
                }

                while (rel.next() && (this.executionTime())) {

                    var relRecord = rel.getValue('child') == serverID ? rel.parent.getRefRecord() : rel.child.getRefRecord(); // relRecord is a related CI (Business Service, Business Application etc)
                    var criteriaArray = [];

                    //IPs that belong to the all CI from main configuration
                    var stringIP = '';
                    var relBack = new GlideRecord('cmdb_rel_ci');
                    relBack.addEncodedQuery('child=' + relRecord.sys_id.toString() + '^ORparent=' + relRecord.sys_id.toString()); // get all relationships of Related CI
                    relBack.addNotNullQuery('parent');
                    relBack.addNotNullQuery('child');
                    relBack.query();

                    // run through all realted CIs of our Related CI (Businsess Service, App etc)
                    while (relBack.next()) {
                        var relBackRecord = relBack.getValue('child') == relRecord.getUniqueValue() ? relBack.parent.getRefRecord() : relBack.child.getRefRecord(); // CI related to Related CI

                        //relBackRecord must filtered by configGR.getValue('encoded_query')
                        var queryMatchBack = GlideFilter.checkRecord(relBackRecord, configGR.encoded_query.toString());

                        var childTablesArray = (new GlideTableHierarchy(configGR.getValue('server_table')).getTableExtensions());
                        childTablesArray.push(relBackRecord.getTableName()); // include main config CI into analysis also
                        var isChild = false;

                        for (var i = 0; i < childTablesArray.length; i++) {
                            if (childTablesArray[i] == relBackRecord.getTableName()) {
                                isChild = true;
                            }
                        }

                        //if (relBackRecord.getTableName() == configGR.getValue('server_table') && queryMatchBack == true) { // This comment is necessary
                        if (isChild && queryMatchBack == true) {
                            if (stringIP) {
                                stringIP += ',' + relBackRecord.ip_address;
                            } else {
                                stringIP = relBackRecord.ip_address;
                            }
                        }
                    }
                    var ipArray = this.getIPs(stringIP, relRecord.name, ipV6Allowed); // IPs that belong to the all CI from main configuration

                    for (var j = 0; j < ipArray.length; j++) {
                        criteriaArray.push({
                            "op": "SUBNET",
                            "field": "numeric_ip_addresses",
                            "argument": ipArray[j]
                        });
                    }

                    var chTable = new GlideRecord('x_akt_guardicore_config');
                    chTable.addQuery('active', true);
                    chTable.addQuery('server_table', relRecord.getTableName());
                    chTable.addQuery('parent', configGR.getUniqueValue());
                    chTable.query();

                    var chTableCount = new GlideAggregate('x_akt_guardicore_config');
                    chTableCount.addQuery('active', true);
                    chTableCount.addQuery('server_table', relRecord.getTableName());
                    chTableCount.addQuery('parent', configGR.getUniqueValue());
                    chTableCount.addAggregate('COUNT');
                    chTableCount.query();
                    chTableCount.next();


                    while (chTable.next() && (this.executionTime())) {
                        var serverTable = chTable.getValue('server_table');
                        var ciFilter = chTable.getValue('encoded_query') || '';

                        var queryMatch = GlideFilter.checkRecord(relRecord, chTable.encoded_query.toString());

                        if (!chTable.getValue('encoded_query') || queryMatch == true) {


                            var keyFieldsChild = ('' + chTable.getValue('label_key_fields')).toString().split(',');
                            var keyDisplayNamesChild = ('' + chTable.getValue('label_key_centra')).toString().split(',');

                            // NEW COUNTING

                            for (var i = 0; i < keyFieldsChild.length; i++) {
                                var fieldNameChild = keyFieldsChild[i];
                                var fieldDisplayNameChild = keyDisplayNamesChild[i];

                                var labelKeyInCentra = fieldDisplayNameChild + ":" + relRecord.getDisplayValue(fieldNameChild); // "key:value"
                                var isUniq = this.uniqLabels.indexOf(labelKeyInCentra) == -1; // -1 if unique

                                if (isUniq) {
                                    this.uniqLabels.push(labelKeyInCentra);
                                    this.totalLabels += 1;
                                }

                                continue; // There is no point in going further in the code

                                // OLD COUNTING

                                var fieldNameChild = keyFieldsChild[i];
                                var fieldDisplayNameChild = keyDisplayNamesChild[i];

                                if (relRecord.getDisplayValue(fieldNameChild)) { // why it works ?
                                    if (criteriaArray.length > 0) {

                                        // ADDING UNIQUE LABELS IN ARRAY

                                        var labelKeyInCentra = fieldDisplayNameChild + ":" + relRecord.getDisplayValue(fieldNameChild); // "key:value" 
                                        var isUniq = this.uniqLabels.indexOf(labelKeyInCentra) == -1; // -1 if unique

                                        if (isUniq) {
                                            this.uniqLabels.push(labelKeyInCentra);
                                            this.totalLabels += 1;
                                        } else {
                                            continue; // don't add to the body if the label is duplicate
                                        }
                                    }
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            } catch (ex) {
                var message = ex.message;
                gs.error("Relationships(5): processRelationships() >> Centra IP: " + centraIP + "\nException creation/updation relationships labels: " + message, "GuardicoreUtils by " + gs.getUserName());
            }
        }

    },


    //IP validator function
    validIP: function(ip, name, ipV6allowed) {

        // PATTERNS
        var ipv4_reg = /^(([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9]{2}|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])\.){3}([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9]{2}|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])$/;
        var ipv4v6_reg = /((^\s*((([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9]{2}|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])\.){3}([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9]{2}|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5]))\s*$)|(^\s*((([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:){7}([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}|:))|(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:){6}(:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}|((25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)){3})|:))|(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:){5}(((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){1,2})|:((25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)){3})|:))|(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:){4}(((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){1,3})|((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4})?:((25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)){3}))|:))|(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:){3}(((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){1,4})|((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){0,2}:((25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)){3}))|:))|(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:){2}(((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){1,5})|((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){0,3}:((25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)){3}))|:))|(([0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}:){1}(((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){1,6})|((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){0,4}:((25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)){3}))|:))|(:(((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){1,7})|((:[0-9A-Fa-f]{1,4}){0,5}:((25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)(\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|1\d\d|[1-9]?\d)){3}))|:)))(%.+)?\s*$))/g;

        // DO NOT EXPORT IPs that start with: 169.254 
        var restrictedStart = '169.254';

        if (ip.startsWith(restrictedStart)) {
            gs.debug("gu: validIP() >> Found Restricted Starting IP for CI " + name + " , ignoring it: " + ip + " | " + gs.getUserName());
            return false;
        }

        var ip_reg = ipV6allowed == true ? ipv4v6_reg : ipv4_reg;

        if (!ip_reg.test(ip.trim())) {
            if (this.dbug) {
                gs.debug("gu: validIP() >> Found invalid IP for CI " + name + " , ignoring it: " + ip + " | " + gs.getUserName());
            }
            return false;
        }

        return true;
    },



    //Getting IP function
    getIPs: function(ips_str, name, ipV6allowed) {
        // if (this.dbug) gs.info('gu: getIPs() ... start | ' + gs.getUserName());

        var ips_list = ips_str.split(','); // Array	
        var resultedIPs = [];

        for (var i = 0; i < ips_list.length; i++) {
            ips_list[i] = ips_list[i].trim();
            if (this.validIP(ips_list[i], name, ipV6allowed)) {
                resultedIPs.push(ips_list[i]);
            } else {
				if (this.dbug) gs.info('gu: getIPs() ... INVALID IP FOUND: | ' + ips_list[i]);
			}
        }

		// no need now
//         if (this.dbug_vm) {
//             gs.info('gu: getIPs:resultedIps.length = ' + resultedIPs.length);
//         }

        return resultedIPs; // Array of IPs
    },

    executionTime: function() {
        return this.terminationTime.after(new GlideDateTime());
    },

    canContinue: function(configID) {
        var configGR = new GlideRecord('x_akt_guardicore_config');
        if (configGR.get(configID)) {
            if (!configGR.is_aborting) {
                return true;
            } else {
                // UPDATE STATE TO "READY"
                configGR.is_calculating = false;
                configGR.is_aborting = false; // it works only if you call canContinue() one time: in parent or in child counting function
                configGR.workflow_state = 'skipped';
                configGR.update();
                return false;
            }
        } else {
            gs.error('gu: countLabels() => canContinue(): Configuration record not found for configID:' + configID);
            return;
        }
    },

    type: 'GuardicoreLabelCounter'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Oleksandr.B_ICL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-29 09:50:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>2a40b991470cc650e85946bd416d4358</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GuardicoreLabelCounter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Guardicore" source="x_akt_guardicore">659d22eb93b571104768f81d6cba105d</sys_package><sys_policy>protected</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Guardicore">659d22eb93b571104768f81d6cba105d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2a40b991470cc650e85946bd416d4358</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-02 01:48:51</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="DELETE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_akt_guardicore_config</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Define Engine</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var engine = gs.getProperty("x_akt_guardicore.guardicore_config_engine"); 
	// for testing. bug found
	if (engine) {
		if (engine == 'workflow') {
			current.engine = 'workflow';
		} else if (engine == 'events') {
			current.engine = 'events';
		}
	} else {
		current.engine = 'events';
	}
	//current.update();
	//     -   - ,  -        -  
	

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Andrii_ICL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-20 08:49:54</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>fa25be1c936082104768f81d6cba1011</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Define Engine</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Guardicore" source="x_akt_guardicore">659d22eb93b571104768f81d6cba105d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Guardicore">659d22eb93b571104768f81d6cba105d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fa25be1c936082104768f81d6cba1011</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Denis_ICL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-28 11:51:45</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="DELETE" query="documentkey=fa25be1c936082104768f81d6cba1011"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_akt_guardicore_config</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Guardicore_RelationshipExport_ParentData</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    if (current.parent_configuration) {
        var parentRecord = new GlideRecord("x_akt_guardicore_config");
        if (parentRecord.get(current.parent)) {
            current.max_execution_time = parentRecord.max_execution_time;
            current.debug = parentRecord.debug;
			//current.override
        }
    }


})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Andrii_ICL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-18 19:06:21</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>249395d04706f910e85946bd416d433e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Guardicore_RelationshipExport_ParentData</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Guardicore" source="x_akt_guardicore">659d22eb93b571104768f81d6cba105d</sys_package><sys_policy>protected</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Guardicore">659d22eb93b571104768f81d6cba105d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_249395d04706f910e85946bd416d433e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Andrii_ICL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-03-05 22:37:27</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=249395d04706f910e85946bd416d433e"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_e440610693080e104768f81d6cba100d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="DELETE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_akt_guardicore.GuardicoreLabelCounterv1</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>GuardicoreLabelCounterv1</name><script><![CDATA[var GuardicoreLabelCounterv1 = Class.create();
GuardicoreLabelCounterv1.prototype = {

    initialize: function(configID) {
        this.configID = configID;
        this.dbug = Boolean(current.getValue('debug') >= '1');
        this.dbug_vm = Boolean(current.getValue('debug') == '2');

        gs.info('gu: initialize(): debug => ' + this.dbug.toString().toUpperCase());
        gs.info('gu: initialize(): debug verbose mode => ' + this.dbug_vm.toString().toUpperCase());

        // SELF-TERMINATION TIME Settings:
        this.actualStart = new GlideDateTime();
        this.terminationTime = new GlideDateTime();
        this.cancelAfterHours = parseInt(current.getValue('max_execution_time'));
        this.terminationTime.addSeconds(3600 * this.cancelAfterHours);
    },

    countLabels: function() {
        if (!this.configID) {
            gs.error('gu: countLabels() >> Centra IP: Configuration ID is missing.');
            return;
        }

        if (this.dbug) {
            gs.info('Counting amount of Labels ... start |' + gs.getUserName());
        }

        try {
            var configGR = new GlideRecord('x_akt_guardicore_config');
            if (configGR.get(this.configID)) {
                // Rest of your script...
            } else {
                gs.error('gu: countLabels() >> Centra IP: Configuration record not found for configID: ' + this.configID);
                return;
            }

            var MAXIMUM_STRING_LENGTH = 25000000;
            var keyFields = configGR.getValue('label_key_fields').toString().split(',');
            var keyDisplayNames = configGR.getValue('label_key_centra').toString().split(',');
            var serverTable = configGR.getValue('server_table');
            var ciFilter = configGR.getValue('encoded_query');
            var blockSize = parseInt(configGR.getValue('export_block_size'));
            var overrideValues = !!configGR.override_values;
            var ipV6Allowed = !!configGR.export_ipv6;
            var totallabels = 0;

            gs.info('Debug: configID=' + configID);
            gs.info('Debug: keyFields=' + keyFields);
            gs.info('Debug: serverTable=' + serverTable);


            //validation check
            if (!serverTable || !keyFields || !keyDisplayNames || keyFields.length != keyDisplayNames.length) {
                gs.error("gu: countLabels() >> Centra IP: " + "\nInvalid input data. Validate Server table and Label Key fields | " + gs.getUserName());
                return;
            }

            //main group looping
            var gaServer = new GlideAggregate(serverTable);
            gaServer.addNotNullQuery('ip_address');
            gs.info('fieldName: ' + fieldName);
            gaServer.addNotNullQuery(fieldName); // Experiment - why it works?
            if (ciFilter)
                gaServer.addEncodedQuery(ciFilter);
            gaServer.groupBy(fieldName); // group records by the same value of a field - create grouped labels
            gaServer.addAggregate('COUNT');
            gaServer.query();

            while (gaServer.next() && (this.executionTime())) { // Group looping             

                var server = new GlideRecord(serverTable);
                server.addNotNullQuery('ip_address');
                server.addQuery(fieldName, gaServer.getValue(fieldName)); // why it works?
                if (ciFilter)
                    server.addEncodedQuery(ciFilter);
                server.query();

                while (server.next() && (this.executionTime())) {

                    var ipArray = this.getIPs(server.ip_address, server.name, ipV6Allowed);

                    for (var j = 0; j < ipArray.length; j++) {
                        totallabels = totallabels + 1;
                        configGR.setValue('total_labels', totallabels);
                        configGR.setWorkflow(false);
                        configGR.update();
                    }
                }
            }
            if (this.executionTime()) this._countRelationships(server, overrideValues, blockSize, configGR, ipV6Allowed);

        } catch (ex) {
            gs.error("gu: countLabels(error): " + " : " + ex + " | " + gs.getUserName());
        }
    },

    _countRelationships: function(server, overrideValues, blockSize, configGR, ipV6Allowed) {
        if (this.dbug_vm) gs.info('Relationships(-1-): _countRelationships() ... start | ' + gs.getUserName()); // DEBUG

        try {
            //relation count
            var rel = new GlideRecord('cmdb_rel_ci');
            rel.addEncodedQuery('child=' + serverID + '^ORparent=' + serverID);
            rel.addNotNullQuery('parent');
            rel.addNotNullQuery('child');
            rel.query();

            var relCount = new GlideAggregate('cmdb_rel_ci');
            relCount.addEncodedQuery('child=' + serverID + '^ORparent=' + serverID);
            relCount.addNotNullQuery('parent');
            relCount.addNotNullQuery('child');
            relCount.addAggregate('COUNT');
            relCount.query();
            relCount.next();

            if (this.dbug_vm) {
                gs.info('Relationships(-2-): _countRelationships() => found total relationships(' + server.name + '): ' + relCount.getAggregate('COUNT') + ' | ' + gs.getUserName());
            }


            while (rel.next() && (this.executionTime())) {

                var relRecord = rel.getValue('child') == serverID ? rel.parent.getRefRecord() : rel.child.getRefRecord(); // relRecord is a related CI (Business Service, Business Application etc)                   

                //IPs that belong to the all CI from main configuration
                var stringIP = '';
                var relBack = new GlideRecord('cmdb_rel_ci');
                relBack.addEncodedQuery('child=' + relRecord.sys_id.toString() + '^ORparent=' + relRecord.sys_id.toString()); // get all relationships of Related CI
                relBack.addNotNullQuery('parent');
                relBack.addNotNullQuery('child');
                relBack.query();

                // run through all realted CIs of our Related CI (Businsess Service, App etc)
                while (relBack.next()) {
                    var relBackRecord = relBack.getValue('child') == relRecord.getUniqueValue() ? relBack.parent.getRefRecord() : relBack.child.getRefRecord(); // CI related to Related CI

                    //relBackRecord must filtered by configGR.getValue('encoded_query')
                    var queryMatchBack = GlideFilter.checkRecord(relBackRecord, configGR.encoded_query.toString());

                    gs.info('queryMatchBack => ' + queryMatchBack + ', relBackRecord:' + relBackRecord.name + '[' + relBackRecord.sys_class_name + ' << ' + relRecord.name);


                    var childTablesArray = (new GlideTableHierarchy(configGR.getValue('server_table')).getTableExtensions());
                    childTablesArray.push(relBackRecord.getTableName()); // include main config CI into analysis also
                    var isChild = false;

                    for (var i = 0; i < childTablesArray.length; i++) {
                        if (childTablesArray[i] == relBackRecord.getTableName()) {
                            isChild = true;
                        }
                    }


                    var chTableCount = new GlideAggregate('x_akt_guardicore_config');
                    chTableCount.addQuery('active', true);
                    chTableCount.addQuery('server_table', relRecord.getTableName());
                    chTableCount.addQuery('parent', configGR.getUniqueValue());
                    chTableCount.addAggregate('COUNT');
                    chTableCount.query();
                    chTableCount.next();
                    totallabels = totallabels + chTableCount.addAggregate('COUNT');
                    configGR.setValue('total_labels', totallabels);
                    configGR.setWorkflow(false);
                    configGR.update();
                }
            }
        } catch (ex) {
            var message = ex.message;
            gs.error("Relationships(5): countRelationships() >> Centra IP: " + "\nException creation/updation relationships labels: " + message, "GuardicoreLabelCounterv1 by " + gs.getUserName());
        }
    },

    type: 'GuardicoreLabelCounterv1'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Denis_ICL</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-31 16:36:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>e440610693080e104768f81d6cba100d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GuardicoreLabelCounterv1</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Guardicore" source="x_akt_guardicore">659d22eb93b571104768f81d6cba105d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Guardicore">659d22eb93b571104768f81d6cba105d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_e440610693080e104768f81d6cba100d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Denis_ICL</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-31 17:01:06</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
